author: therealvang

text: Two of my favorite games.  I've been wanting a Dark Spire 2 ever since I finished the first one!  I've played every dungeon crawler this gen and I need more! I've even played Class of Heroes, which was better than expected but not nearly as good as EO or Dark Spire. I've played all of the oldies too, EotB, Bard's Tale, Wizardry, M&M, etc.

author: shadowsdieaway

text:
Oooh, this makes me want to get back to this banger of a game...I got sidetracked and started Etrian Odyssey II, which is ALSO a great old-school dungeon crawler.

OLD-SCHOOL GAMERS STAND UP! If you are longing for the days when games actually posed a challenge then Atlus' Dark Spire and Etrian Odyssey games are what you're looking for. Super fresh games!
author: djfakt

text:
Ah, I need to get back into playing this (If I can muster up the willpower to train my thief another 3 stat points just to class change him because wouldn't you know it for some damn odd reason Thief/Mage combo requires strength to promote... ...).  The music was great.

I think the star of the soundtrack was the 'boss' battle theme though.
